document.full_text: the tampa bay rays scored three early runs and rode the brilliant pitching of jeremy hellickson to a nail-biting 3-2 win over the seattle mariners on saturday.
document.title: rays sting mariners to halt skid
lines_and_colors: the tampa bay rays scored three early runs and rode the brilliant pitching of jeremy hellickson to a nail-biting 3-2 win over the seattle mariners on saturday.
